fields.description:
Tested in with Console installed from packages on CentOS pointing to VPCMido Cloud.
I can not create Scaling groups since the "Next" button is permanently inactive.

I also noticed that the selected Min, Desired and Max capacity does not show in the summary.
Screenshot attached.
fields.summary: In create Autoscaling Group wizard the "Next" button in step 1 fails to activate when min/desired/max are changed

comments.body: [~kgill] we tested this on package installs. You can reproduce it on https://10.111.5.1 console.
[~alice]: I was able to reproduce this, although I'm having trouble pinpointing the cause since the scaling group files haven't been touched in a while.  Do we know if the issue affects 4.1?
This issue does not appear to affect 4.1 (whew), although I haven't been able to pinpoint the cause of the regression in 4.2 yet.
Note that the scaling group detail page has some validation issues, which I'm fixing with the issues on the wizard.

hi [~kgill], I noticed in this branch that the Next button on step 1 is activated as soon as I start the wizard, when it should be disabled still (not all required fields contain data, the name field is empty, and I haven't selected a launch config or VPC subnet).
[~jloza]: Fixed issue with Next button on step 1

Hi Kamal,

The next buttons activation looks like it is dependent on the name field only. As you can see in the screenshot, Launch config and VPC subnet(s) are both also required but do not have actual values selected yet. 

Also, I am noticing a couple more weirdnesses on this particular screen w/r/t styling that maybe we could fix here to since they are related? the launch config and VPC network selector widgets do not seem to be using the right font (I suspect all the foundation dropdowns are not having their default font overridden with Lato), and the VPC Subnet multi-chosen field seems to be missing the right border keyline. I know these are out of the specifics of this original bug, and I could write a separate ticket for the foundation dropdowns as I suspect that is a global issue if you'd like (though I think the missing keyline is specific to this page).
[~jloza]: The master branch also appears to have the "Next button is active when the VPC subnet(s) required field is empty" issue.  Will fix that here, and will look into the font and style issues.

[~jloza]: I've updated the font family for the select drop-downs in the wizard, and I added a button-check condition for the VPC subnets in step 1.  I'm not seeing the missing right-border for the VPC subnet field (tested on Safari, Chrome, Firefox), and the CSS for that field looks fine.  Perhaps you could show me in a joinme session?

Almost there, [~kgill]! You forgot to make launch config in non-vpc setups a button check condition like VPC. Attached screenshot for that.

also, when i checked on the vpc cloud, I got an error after i selected an LC that said it was required, even though i have one selected. Something is wonky? Screenshot attached. Also, if you could make the length of the LC field consistent with the other fields that would be great. I think it was before.

[~jloza]: I've pushed a few more validation fixes, so feel free to have another look.  I'm not seeing the field size discrepancy or the "select launch config twice" error on the latest GUI-1789 branch, so I'm puzzled by your last two screenshots.  Perhaps let me know if you still observe those issues (after emptying the browser's cache) and we can screen share?

Yay, [~kgill]! Great job!

UX review passed, ready for code review.

This is fixed.  The 'Next' button stays enabled after adjusting the min/max/desired values.  I also noticed the up/down arrow keys are gone.  Was this expected behavior?
{code}
[root@g-19-11 ~]# rpm -qi eucaconsole
Name        : eucaconsole                  Relocations: (not relocatable)
Version     : 4.1.1                             Vendor: Eucalyptus Systems, Inc.
Release     : 0.0.6499.423.20150613gitf77c76c.el6   Build Date: Sat 13 Jun 2015 08:43:48 PM PDT
Install Date: Mon 15 Jun 2015 12:00:52 PM PDT      Build Host: euca-10-111-54-165
Group       : Unspecified                   Source RPM: eucaconsole-4.1.1-0.0.6499.423.20150613gitf77c76c.el6.src.rpm
Size        : 14390333                         License: BSD and MIT and OFL
{code}
[~ccassler]: We had to replace the input type="number" fields with plain old input type="text" to fix this bug, so the missing up/down arrows are expected here.
